oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Bushman names for a few Stones were given by D !kw in (L V.
20. 5574 and 5575), and by lhan kass o (L VIII.
21. 7818, 7834). A list of the |xam and proper names of stones and gemstones, given by Dia!kwain at the Philadelphia Exhibition.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The names of stones
